DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Tomato-soy juice may slow growth tumor cell . Studying sample blood tissue patient prostate cancer laboratory may help doctor identify biomarkers related cancer . It may also help doctor understand effect tomato-soy juice biomarkers . PURPOSE : This phase I/II trial study side effect tomato-soy juice effect biomarkers patient prostate cancer undergo prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Tomato-Soy Juice Biomarkers Patients With Prostate Cancer Undergoing Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine incidence severity toxicity associate tomato-soy juice patient undergo prostatectomy . Secondary - Quantify change content distribution soy isoflavones tomato phytochemical ( carotenoid polyphenols ) prostate correlate tissue content pattern blood urinary concentration compound metabolite . - Determine blood hormonal pattern biomarkers oxidative stress favor prostate cancer prevention . - Investigate histopathologic molecular biomarkers associate prostate carcinogenesis may serve surrogate endpoint biomarkers provide information regard ability modulate tomato-soy juice . - Examine several critical histopathologic endpoint , include systemic hormone , cell/matrix interaction tumor microenvironment , molecular process within tumor cell ( tumor grade nuclear morphometry , tumor stage , proliferation index , apoptotic index , angiogenesis/vascularity ) . - Determine consumption tomato-soy juice alters molecular marker human prostate , include neuroendocrine marker IGF-I IGF-BP3 , signal transduction marker PTEN ( phosphatase tensin homologue ) phospho-AKT , angiogenesis regulator VEGF ( vascular epithelial growth factor ) . OUTLINE : Patients receive tomato-soy juice daily 4 week . Patients undergo prostatectomy . Patients complete urologic symptom quality-of-life questionnaire . Blood , urine , tissue sample collect biomarker pharmacokinetic analysis .
DOC.criteria: Biopsy proven carcinoma prostate . Have choose radical prostatectomy ( cystoprostatectomy ) treatment disease present possible option medical team . Not receive neoadjuvant hormonal chemotherapy ( clinical trial ) ECOG ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ) performance status 01 Not currently take lycopene , soy dietary supplement , `` alternative '' product ( i.e . PCSPES , Saw Palmetto ) . BUN/Cr ( Blood urea nitrogen serum creatinine ) , liver enzymes , CBC ( complete blood count ) , PT/PTT/INR ( prothrombin time/partial thromboblastin time ) within normal limit . Voluntarily agree participate sign inform consent document . Agree prostate biopsy block provide study evaluation . Agree consume standardize vitamin mineral supplement avoid nutrition , dietary , alternative medications/supplements duration study . Exclusion : Active malignancy prostate cancer require therapy . History traumatic surgical castration . History pituitary hormone diseases currently require supplemental hormonal administration ( thyroid hormone , ACTH , growth hormone ) endocrine disorder require hormone administration exception diabetes osteoporosis . Are take certain medication . No concurrent finasteride ( Proscar ) hormonal agent chemoprevention/treatment BPH ( benign prostate hyperplasia ) . Utilizing prescription medication urinary outlet obstructive symptom permit . The use nonprescription substance improve urinary tract symptom permit ( i.e . Saw Palmetto , herbal , alternative product ) . Have certain medical condition include : malabsorptive disorder metabolic disorder require special diet recommendation , severe constipation ( may accentuate soy ) , recent history anemia iron deficiency ( possible accentuation soy ) , hypertension require strict low sodium diet ( tomato juice high sodium ) . The severity condition eligibility define careful review medical record Dr. Clinton . Have know allergy soy tomato component .
